title: HOUR 1 - Justin Fields, Mac Jones, Geoff Schwartz
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Justin Fields, Mac Jones, Geoff Schwartz
description:
The Bears seems to have set rookie QB Justin Fields up for failure with lack of support on the offensive side of the ball. Mac Jones appears to have great leadership ability and work ethic, but what makes him special? Geoff Schwartz join to talk the Bears, Patriots and more NFL.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
